name: Market Dominion: Board Edition
description:
The day of release is the first anniversary of the release of 'Market Dominion'! Because of that, we've got something special prepared for you!

Starting from now, you can play 'Market Dominion' in a brand new way...

MARKET DOMINION: BOARD EDITION

The well-known game that has started the entire thing is now available as a board game! Meet with your friends and relax while playing this little indie, board game, based on 'Market Dominion'. Collect Deal Power and grow your company! Whoever has the highest score by the end of the game - wins!

In 'Market Dominion: Board Edition' you can play alone with AI or with your friends on your personal computer in hot seat mode! Chose one of those ways to play a board version of the game 'Market Dominion'! Specialists, Shop, various themed pawns... all of that is wating for you and others!

'Market Dominion: Board Edition' is free of charge, it is MD's first anniversary surprise. You are, however, free to donate any amount of money you'd like to donate.

To download the game:

- download the ZIP file in the shop,

- extract the files to a folder,

- keep .exe and .pck together in one directory, you can make a shortcut for yourself.

RECOMMENDED OS: Windows 10

Older versions of Windows were proven to have some errors. We will be working on them in the future, to ensure everyone can play the game.

Download the game and have fun!

Iguana Mercenary Team
